name: Caustic Abyss Demo
description:
They took something from you.  Dragged it down to the deepest, darkest pits of the Ocean and killed it.  You're here to make them pay.

This is a boss rush game that I am working on with Sam Chung, Sam Gould, and Kyler Kubo.  Here's where you can find us:

Sam Gould:  https://form67.itch.io/

Sam Chung:  

Kyler Kubo:  

Jordan Peloquin:  My profile is here, but my e-mail is jpeloquin16bf@gmail.com

After unpacking the zipped folder, run the application called "DeepGame" to run the game.  WASD moves, holding down the left mouse button fires.  Have fun!

Also, follow us on social media!!

E-mail:  CausticAbyssGame@gmail.com

Instagram:  @CausticAbyss

Twitter:  @AbyssCaustic

Facebook:  @CausticAbyssGame
